name: jqx.jqxGrid
description: The jqxGrid is a powerful jQuery widget that displays tabular data.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Sets the grid"s width.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Sets the grid"s height.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Enables the Grid"s plugin.

properties.name: altrows
properties.description: Enables or disables the alternating rows.

properties.name: rowsheight
properties.description: Sets the height of the grid rows.

properties.name: columnsheight
properties.description: Sets the columns height.

properties.name: dataBinding
properties.defaultValue:
{"header":[{"name":"Person","type":"string"},{"name":"Height","type":"number"},{"name":"Age","type":"number"},{"name":"IQ","type":"number"},{"name":"","type":"boolean"}],"cellsaligns":["left","center","right","left"],"cellsratios":["30", "60", "10", "0"],"data":[["John Snow",178,19,123,false],["Peter Petrelly",175,26,105,true],["James Dean",190,32,135,true],["Matthew Rogan",183,19,150,true]],"raw":"Person, Height, Age, IQ, 
John Snow, 178, 19, 123, [x]
Peter Petrelly, 175, 26, 105, [o]
James Dean, 190, 32, 135, [o]
Matthew Rogan, 183, 19, 150, [o]
{30L, 40C, 10R, 10L}"}
properties.description: Data binding of grid.

properties.name: uip-selectable
properties.description: Sets whether the widget is selectable.

properties.name: rtl
properties.description: Sets or gets a value indicating whether widget's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.

properties.name: theme
properties.description: Sets the widget's theme.

properties.name: altstart
properties.description: This property specifies the first alternating row.

properties.name: altstep
properties.description: Sets or gets the alternating step.

properties.name: showdefaultloadelement
properties.description: Determines whether the Grid should display the built-in loading element or should use a DIV tag with class 'jqx-grid-load'.

properties.name: autoshowloadelement
properties.description: Determines whether the loading image should be displayed until the Grid's data is loaded.

properties.name: autoshowfiltericon
properties.description: Displays the filter icon only when the column is filtered. When the value of this property is set to false, all grid columns will display a filter icon when the filtering s enabled.

properties.name: closeablegroups
properties.description: When the value of this property is true, a close button is displayed in each grouping column

properties.name: enableellipsis
properties.description: Determines whether ellipsis will be displayed, if the cells or columns content overflows.

properties.name: enablemousewheel
properties.description: Determines whether mousewheel scrolling is enabled.

properties.name: columnsmenuwidth
properties.description: Sets or gets the columns menu width.

properties.name: autoshowcolumnsmenubutton
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the columns menu button will be displayed only when the mouse cursor is over a columns header or will be always displayed.

properties.name: enableanimations
properties.description: Enables or disables the grid animations.

properties.name: enabletooltips
properties.description: Enables or disables the grid tooltips.

properties.name: enablehover
properties.description: Enables or disables the grid rows hover state.

properties.name: enablebrowserselection
properties.description: Enables the text selection of the browser.

properties.name: groupsexpandedbydefault
properties.description: Sets or gets the default state of the grouped rows.

properties.name: showfiltercolumnbackground
properties.description: When this property is true, the Grid adds an additional visual style to the grid cells in the filter column(s).

properties.name: showfiltermenuitems
properties.description: Determines whether to display the filtering items in the column's menu.

properties.name: showpinnedcolumnbackground
properties.description: When this property is true, the Grid adds an additional visual style to the grid cells in the pinned column(s).

properties.name: showsortcolumnbackground
properties.description: When this property is true, the Grid adds an additional visual style to the grid cells in the sort column.

properties.name: showsortmenuitems
properties.description: Determines whether to display the sort menu items.

properties.name: showgroupmenuitems
properties.description: Determines whether to display the group menu items.

properties.name: showrowdetailscolumn
properties.description: Shows an additional column with expand/collapse toggle buttons when the Row details feature is enabled.

properties.name: showheader
properties.description: Shows or hides the columns header.

properties.name: showgroupsheader
properties.description: Shows or hides the groups header area.

properties.name: showaggregates
properties.description: Shows or hides the aggregates in the grid's statusbar.

properties.name: showfilterrow
properties.description: Shows or hides the filter row.

properties.name: showemptyrow
properties.description: Shows or hides the empty row label when the Grid has no records to display.

properties.name: showstatusbar
properties.description: Shows or hides the grid's statusbar.

properties.name: statusbarheight
properties.description: Sets the statusbar's height.

properties.name: showtoolbar
properties.description: Shows or hides the grid's toolbar.

properties.name: toolbarheight
properties.description: Sets or gets the toolbar's height.

properties.name: pagerheight
properties.description: Sets or gets the height of the Grid Pager.

properties.name: groupsheaderheight
properties.description: Sets or gets the height of the Grid Groups Header.

properties.name: groupindentwidth
properties.description: Sets or gets the group indent size. This size is used when the grid is grouped. This is the size of the columns with expand/collapse toggle buttons.

properties.name: autoheight
properties.description: Sets or gets the height of the grid to be equal to the summary height of the grid rows. This option should be set when the Grid is in paging mode.

properties.name: autorowheight
properties.description: This property works along with the "autoheight" property. When it is set to true, the height of the Grid rows is dynamically changed depending on the cell values.

properties.name: scrollbarsize
properties.description: Sets or gets the scrollbars size.

properties.name: verticalscrollbarstep
properties.description: Sets or gets the scrollbar's step when the user clicks the scroll arrows.

properties.name: verticalscrollbarlargestep
properties.description: Sets or gets the scrollbar's large step. This property specifies the step with which the vertical scrollbar's value is changed when the user clicks the area above or below the thumb.

properties.name: horizontalscrollbarlargestep
properties.description: Sets or gets the scrollbar's large step. This property specifies the step with which the horizontal scrollbar's value is changed when the user clicks the area above or below the thumb.

properties.name: keyboardnavigation
properties.description: Enables or disables the keyboard navigation.

properties.name: autosavestate
properties.description: Determines whether the Grid automatically saves its current state.

properties.name: autoloadstate
properties.description: Determines whether the Grid automatically loads its current state(if there's already saved one). The Grid's state is loaded when the page is refreshed.

properties.name: pagesize
properties.description: Sets or gets the number of visible rows per page when the Grid paging is enabled.

properties.name: pagerbuttonscount
properties.description: Sets or gets the buttons displayed in the pager when the "pagermode" is set to "simple".

properties.name: rowdetails
properties.description: Enables or disables the row details. When this option is enabled, the Grid can show additional information below each grid row.

properties.name: pageable
properties.description: Enables or disables the Grid Paging feature. When the value of this property is true, the Grid displays a pager below the rows.

properties.name: filterable
properties.description: Enables or disables the Grid Filtering feature. When the value of this property is true, the Grid displays a filtering panel in the columns popup menus.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: The editable property enables or disables the Grid editing feature.

properties.name: sortable
properties.description: The sortable property enables or disables the sorting feature.

properties.name: groupable
properties.description: This property enables or disables the grouping feature.

properties.name: selectedrowindex
properties.description: Selects a row at a specified index.

properties.name: updatedelay
properties.description: Sets or gets the rendering update delay. This could be used for deferred scrolling scenarios.

properties.name: virtualmode
properties.description: Enables or disables the virtual data mode.

properties.name: columnsmenu
properties.description: Enables or disables the columns dropdown menu.

properties.name: columnsresize
properties.description: Enables or disables the columns resizing.

properties.name: columnsreorder
properties.description: Enables or disables the columns reordering.

events.name: rowclick
events.description: This event is triggered when a row is clicked.
